attributes.action: Reverse the decision to stop the sale of "red" diesel for pleasure craft.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pleasure craft have always been allowed to buy "red" diesel i.e. fuel dyed for identification with a lower tax status than DERV (Diesel Engined Road Vehicles). This fuel is available for off-road,agricultural and industrial uses.
Canal boats and pleasure craft are non-road users of diesel fuel, often operate on a limited budget, and should not be subjected to this inappropriate taxation.
